#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <map>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, lastVal, i;
	map<int,bool> A;
	map<int,string> B;
	map<string,int> C;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		
		C[ s ]++;
		
		if( A[ C[ s ] ] == false) {
			
			A[ C[ s ] ] = true;
			B[ C[ s ] ] = s;
			lastVal = C[ s ];
		}
	}
	
	for( i = 1;i <= lastVal;i++ )
		cout << i << " " << B[ i ] << endl;
		
	return 0;
}
